title: Set Up New Tenant in Online Portal
description: A new tenant has signed a lease. The PM needs to set them up with an account for the online tenant portal to pay rent and submit maintenance requests.

tasks.description: Create a new user account in the tenant portal using the tenant's information.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new portal account is created for the tenant.

tasks.description: Link the user account to the correct property unit and lease agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: The portal account is correctly associated with the tenant's specific unit and financial ledger.

tasks.description: Send a welcome email to the tenant with a link to activate their portal account and set a password.
tasks.expected_outcome: An automated welcome and activation email is sent to the new tenant.
